Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory()
      It creates an empty inventory.

      It adds a stack of items to the inventory in a new position.

      It deletes the items from the given position.

      Override method to check if objects are equal

      It returns the items that the player holds in his or her hand

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public int addItem(ItemStack is)
        It adds a stack of items to the inventory in a new position.
        Parameters:
        is - ItemStack to add
        Returns:
        amount of items

      • clear

        public void clear()
        It empties the inventory, including the item in the player’s hand.

      • clear

        public void clear(int slot)
           throws model.exceptions.BadInventoryPositionException
        It deletes the items from the given position.
        Parameters:
        slot - position in inventory to remove
        Throws:
        model.exceptions.BadInventoryPositionException - if the given position does not exist

      • first

        public int first(Material m)
        It returns the index of the first position in the inventory that contains items of the given type
        Parameters:
        m - type of material to search
        Returns:
        index or -1 if not found

      • getItem

        public ItemStack getItem(int n)
        It returns the items in a given inventory position.
        Parameters:
        n - position in inventory
        Returns:
        items in given position or null

      • getItemInHand

        public ItemStack getItemInHand()
        It returns the items that the player holds in his or her hand
        Returns:
        item holding in hand

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        It returns the size of the inventory, excluding the item ‘inHand’.
        Returns:
        size of inventory

      • setItem

        public void setItem(int pos,
                    ItemStack items)
             throws model.exceptions.BadInventoryPositionException
        It stores the items in the given inventory position.
        Parameters:
        pos - position in inventory to set item
        items - items to place in inventory
        Throws:
        model.exceptions.BadInventoryPositionException - if the position does not exist (counting from zero)

      • setItemInHand

        public void setItemInHand(ItemStack items)
        It assigns the items to carry in the hand by the player.
        Parameters:
        items - items to set in player's hand
